languages.text: "Возносите молитву смиренную к подножию трона Его, поминайте в мыслях своих Его, страшитесь гнева Его, преследуйте сомнения в Нем и восставайте против хулы на Него".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Бла бла, но Император защищает так восславим же его в молитве

languages.text: "Offer thy humble prayer to the foot of His Throne, keep Him always in thy thoughts, fear His wrath, persecute doubt in Him, and rise up against any who would defame Him."
languages.original_text: "Возносите молитву смиренную к подножию трона Его, поминайте в мыслях своих Его, страшитесь гнева Его, преследуйте сомнения в Нем и восставайте против хулы на Него".

traits.locale_text: "Offer thy humble prayer to the foot of His Throne, keep Him always in thy thoughts, fear His wrath, persecute doubt in Him, and rise up against any who would defame Him."
"Offer thy humble prayer to the foot of His Throne, keep Him always in thy thoughts, fear His wrath, persecute doubt in Him, and rise up against any who would defame Him."

"Offer thy humble prayer to the foot of His Throne, keep Him always in thy thoughts, fear His wrath, persecute doubt in Him, and rise up against any who would defame Him."

languages.text: “在祂的黄金王座之下，献上你谦卑的祈祷。你的思想中，永远都要为祂留有一席之地。畏惧祂的怒火，消灭对祂的怀疑，反抗所有胆敢诽谤祂的敌人。”
languages.original_text: "Offer thy humble prayer to the foot of His Throne, keep Him always in thy thoughts, fear His wrath, persecute doubt in Him, and rise up against any who would defame Him."

traits.locale_text: “在祂的黄金王座之下，献上你谦卑的祈祷。你的思想中，永远都要为祂留有一席之地。畏惧祂的怒火，消灭对祂的怀疑，反抗所有胆敢诽谤祂的敌人。”

languages.text: «Ofreced vuestras humildes plegarias a los pies de su Trono, tenedle siempre en mente, temed su ira, perseguid a quienes dudan y alzaos en contra de cualquiera que lo difame».
languages.original_text: "Offer thy humble prayer to the foot of His Throne, keep Him always in thy thoughts, fear His wrath, persecute doubt in Him, and rise up against any who would defame Him."

traits.locale_text: «Ofreced vuestras humildes plegarias a los pies de su Trono, tenedle siempre en mente, temed su ira, perseguid a quienes dudan y alzaos en contra de cualquiera que lo difame».

languages.text: 「汝の慎ましき祈りを皇帝の王座のもとに捧げ、常に皇帝を心中に留め、皇帝の怒りを恐れ、皇帝への疑いを振り払い、皇帝を謗る者に立ち上がるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Offer thy humble prayer to the foot of His Throne, keep Him always in thy thoughts, fear His wrath, persecute doubt in Him, and rise up against any who would defame Him."

traits.locale_text: 「汝の慎ましき祈りを皇帝の王座のもとに捧げ、常に皇帝を心中に留め、皇帝の怒りを恐れ、皇帝への疑いを振り払い、皇帝を謗る者に立ち上がるのだ」

languages.text: "Entbietet in Demut Euer Gebet am Fuße Seines Throns, haltet Ihn ständig in Euren Gedanken, fürchtet seinen Zorn, zweifelt nicht an Ihm, und erhebt Euch gegen alle, die Ihn verunglimpfen."
languages.original_text: "Offer thy humble prayer to the foot of His Throne, keep Him always in thy thoughts, fear His wrath, persecute doubt in Him, and rise up against any who would defame Him."

traits.locale_text: "Entbietet in Demut Euer Gebet am Fuße Seines Throns, haltet Ihn ständig in Euren Gedanken, fürchtet seinen Zorn, zweifelt nicht an Ihm, und erhebt Euch gegen alle, die Ihn verunglimpfen."

languages.text: « Offrez votre humble prière au pied de Son trône, gardez-Le toujours dans vos pensées, craignez Sa colère, chassez les doutes Le concernant et dressez-vous contre quiconque salirait Son nom. »
languages.original_text: "Offer thy humble prayer to the foot of His Throne, keep Him always in thy thoughts, fear His wrath, persecute doubt in Him, and rise up against any who would defame Him."

traits.locale_text: « Offrez votre humble prière au pied de Son trône, gardez-Le toujours dans vos pensées, craignez Sa colère, chassez les doutes Le concernant et dressez-vous contre quiconque salirait Son nom. »

languages.text: "Mütevazı dualarınızı O'nun Taht'ına yöneltin, O'na her daim düşüncelerinizde yer verin, O'nun öfkesinden korkun, O'ndan şüphe edenlere zulmedin, O'na dil uzatan her kim olursa olsun karşısında durun."
languages.original_text: "Offer thy humble prayer to the foot of His Throne, keep Him always in thy thoughts, fear His wrath, persecute doubt in Him, and rise up against any who would defame Him."

traits.locale_text: "Mütevazı dualarınızı O'nun Taht'ına yöneltin, O'na her daim düşüncelerinizde yer verin, O'nun öfkesinden korkun, O'ndan şüphe edenlere zulmedin, O'na dil uzatan her kim olursa olsun karşısında durun."
